about_the_game:
Looking for a bigger and better word game that will keep you hooked for hours? Look no further than Wordle 2!

Wordle 2 is the sequel to the popular word game Wordle, and it's even more addictive than the original. With new and challenging levels, you'll be able to test your vocabulary skills like never before.

In Wordle 2, you'll be given a set of letters and your task is to create as many words as you can with those letters. The longer the word, the more points you'll earn. But be careful - some of the levels have hidden words that are worth extra points, so keep your eyes peeled!

With its beautiful graphics and engaging gameplay, Wordle 2 is the perfect game for anyone who loves word puzzles. It's also a great way to keep your mind sharp and improve your vocabulary and spelling skills.

So why wait? Buy Wordle 2 now and see how many words you can create. With its addictive gameplay and new levels, it's a game you won't be able to put down!
detailed_description:
TRADING CARDS


About the Game


Looking for a bigger and better word game that will keep you hooked for hours? Look no further than Wordle 2!

Wordle 2 is the sequel to the popular word game Wordle, and it's even more addictive than the original. With new and challenging levels, you'll be able to test your vocabulary skills like never before.

In Wordle 2, you'll be given a set of letters and your task is to create as many words as you can with those letters. The longer the word, the more points you'll earn. But be careful - some of the levels have hidden words that are worth extra points, so keep your eyes peeled!

With its beautiful graphics and engaging gameplay, Wordle 2 is the perfect game for anyone who loves word puzzles. It's also a great way to keep your mind sharp and improve your vocabulary and spelling skills.

So why wait? Buy Wordle 2 now and see how many words you can create. With its addictive gameplay and new levels, it's a game you won't be able to put down!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 & Steam OS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 55 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.x (Show Leopard)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 55 MB available space

name: Wordle 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 55 MB available space

short_description: Wordle 2 is a challenging and addictive word game that will put your vocabulary and spelling skills to the test with exciting new levels and hidden bonus words.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
*languages with full audio support
